item.title: Dulce Pontes - Lela - Key of Am - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Lela by Dulce Pontes from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: A7, Am, Amadd9, B, Cmaj7, Dm, E7, F, G7.
